pages.text: You can configure difficulty calculation in config: There are config values that allow mobs spawned further from origin to have higher levels, and config values that allow mobs you meet to have a level bonus for each dimension you have visited.$(br2)You can also specify how frequent mobs with level and trait will spawn.
You can also specify how much mobs are buffed, and the strength of each trait in config. All numbers are configurable in this mod.$(br2)Advanced configuration are available through datapack.
